sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { StyleSheet, ScrollView, Text } from 'react-native';
import { DataTable } from 'react-native-paper';
import { DiamondData } from '../data/DiamondData';

const TableExample = () => {
return (
	<DataTable style={styles.container}>
		<DataTable.Header style={styles.tableHeader}>
			<DataTable.Title>{item.title}</DataTable.Title>
			<DataTable.Title>Shape</DataTable.Title>
			<DataTable.Title>Carat</DataTable.Title>
		</DataTable.Header>
		<DataTable.Row>
			<DataTable.Cell>LG-75988</DataTable.Cell>
			<DataTable.Cell>EMERALD</DataTable.Cell>
			<DataTable.Cell>0.69</DataTable.Cell>
		</DataTable.Row>
		<DataTable.Row>
			<DataTable.Cell>LG-75988</DataTable.Cell>
			<DataTable.Cell>ROUND</DataTable.Cell>
			<DataTable.Cell>0.71</DataTable.Cell>
		</DataTable.Row>
		<DataTable.Row>
			<DataTable.Cell>LG-75988</DataTable.Cell>
			<DataTable.Cell>PEAR</DataTable.Cell>
			<DataTable.Cell>0.72</DataTable.Cell>
		</DataTable.Row>

		<DataTable.Row>
			<DataTable.Cell></DataTable.Cell>
			<DataTable.Cell></DataTable.Cell>
			<DataTable.Cell></DataTable.Cell>
		</DataTable.Row>
		<DataTable.Row>
			<DataTable.Cell></DataTable.Cell>
			<DataTable.Cell></DataTable.Cell>
			<DataTable.Cell></DataTable.Cell>
		</DataTable.Row>
		<DataTable.Row>
			<DataTable.Cell></DataTable.Cell>
			<DataTable.Cell></DataTable.Cell>
			<DataTable.Cell></DataTable.Cell>
		</DataTable.Row>
	</DataTable>
);
};

export default TableExample;

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
container: {
	padding: 10,
	border: '1px solid blue',
},
tableHeader: {
	backgroundColor: '#DCDCDC',
	border: '1px solid red',
	width: '100%',
},
tableRightBorder: {
	borderWidth: 0,
	border: '1px solid red',
	borderRightWidth: 1,
	borderColor: 'black',
	borderStyle: 'solid',
	flex: 1,
	textAlign: 'center',
	alignItems: 'center',
}
});
